forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind 0 to 8 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The sun casts a gentle warmth over Downtown San Francisco today, offering a tableau of vivid blue skies as far as the eye can see. With temperatures hovering near a comfortable 68 degrees, the day begins with a promise of pleasantness that is rarely matched. There is a light breeze whispering through the city, nudging the warmth into the afternoon, as shadows traverse the streets, falling towards a sort of soft golden hour glow. The air is notably clear, revealing the famed skyline and extending beyond to the shimmering waters of the bay, with not a hint of the usual fog that can blanket the area.

As the sun sinks lower, the evening promises to cool off, settling into a serene 52 degrees—ideal for an engaging stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet moment in one of the parks, under the stars that will soon fill the night sky. Dress in layers; a light sweater will keep you cozy as the day softly transitions into night. It’s a perfect evening for enjoying a warm drink, perhaps in the cozy embrace of a local café, or watching the city’s lights twinkle against the backdrop of a clear sky. Overall, today invites the spirit to wander with ease and savor the beauty that surrounds this vibrant city—a delightful day to be out in San Francisco.
